thread.title: Vijender Singh vs Sonny Whiting Live Telecast: Get broadcast of Indian boxer’s debut professional bout at Manchester Arena, UK
thread.title_full: Vijender Singh vs Sonny Whiting Live Telecast: Get broadcast of Indian boxer’s debut professional bout at Manchester Arena, UK

author: Rashmi Mishra | India.com Sports Desk
title: Vijender Singh vs Sonny Whiting Live Telecast: Get broadcast of Indian boxer’s debut professional bout at Manchester Arena, UK
text:
Vijender Singh vs Sonny Whiting Live Telecast: Get broadcast of Indian boxer’s debut professional bout at Manchester Arena, UK By India.com Sports Desk on October 10, 2015 at 6:26 PM Comments Indian boxing star Vijender Singh will be meeting British opponent Sonny Whiting in his debut professional boxing match on October 10. The 2012 Olympics bronze medalist pugilist will be fighting Sonny in the Manchester Arena, United Kingdom with the live telecast done by Sony Six. The exclusive broadcast rights of Vijender Singh vs Sonny Whiting, boxing match was bought by Sony SIX (a part of Multi Screen Media Network), India’s premier sports entertainment channel. The highly anticipated sporting event will start at 9.30 pm IST. The Vijender Singh vs Sonny Whiting has been promoted as ‘World War 3′. Also Read: Vijender Singh vs Sonny Whiting: All you need to know about the fight . The 29-year-old Vijendra has been training for his professional debut for more than a month with experienced trainer Lee Beard. He will take on Whiting over four rounds in the middleweight division, as he begins his quest to become India’s first ever professional boxing world champion. He had come face-to-face with his opponent Sonny Whiting on Wednesday and both promised an explosive fight when the Indian boxing sensation makes his professional debut at the Manchester Arena on Saturday. Also Read: Salman Khan wishes Vijender Singh ahead of professional boxing bout debut . Whiting has fought three bouts in his professional career so far, and has won two of them. Apart from the bout between Vijender and Whiting, two other fights featuring Terry Flanagan and Diego Magdaleno along with Liam Smith and John Thompson will also take place. 
  6:26 PM Topics:
